# St Helena Health Information Hub

::: {.lead}
#### Local, trustworthy health information — simply.
:::

---

This site brings together information, learning, and evidence to support the health of all of us on **St Helena**. It is part of a wider effort to make health information open, understandable, and useful in everyday life on the island.

<div class="hub-cards">

<div class="hub-card">

<div class="hub-card-icon">

<div class="hub-card-title">
What’s here now
</div>

The Hub currently focuses on work linked to our **Total Meal Replacement (TMR) pilot**, part of ongoing efforts to improve diabetes care and long-term health.

Here you’ll find background, aims, and practical learning as the work develops.
</div>

<div class="hub-card">

<div class="hub-card-title">
What this site will become
</div>

Over time, the Hub will grow into a shared space for understanding health on St Helena. </br></br>Bringing together evidence and learning from local projects and programmes.
</div>

<div class="hub-card-title">
Who this is for
</div>

This site is for everyone. </br></br>People living on St Helena, those working in health and care, students, researchers, and anyone who wants clear health information without jargon.
